metadata.description: October, 1944. Nazi fortunes appear bleaker by the day. But in the bowels of the Wenceslas Mines, a terrible threat has emerged... The Nazis have discovered the ability to conquer time itself with the help of a new ominous device!  Now a rag tag group of American GIs must stop this threat to the past, present, and future... While dealing with their past, prejudices, and fears in the process.
metadata.name: Time Grunts
